shoes.name: Air Max 270
shoes.details: The Air Max 270 combines style and comfort with its large Air unit in the heel.

shoes.name: React Infinity Run
shoes.details: The React Infinity Run is designed to help reduce the risk of running-related injuries.

shoes.name: Joyride Run Flyknit
shoes.details: The Joyride Run Flyknit features tiny foam beads in the sole for a cushioned feel.

shoes.name: Air Zoom Pegasus 38
shoes.details: The Air Zoom Pegasus 38 is a versatile and responsive running shoe.

shoes.name: Blazer Mid '77 Vintage
shoes.details: The Blazer Mid '77 Vintage offers a classic basketball shoe look with a retro feel.

shoes.name: Air Force 1
shoes.details: The Air Force 1 is an iconic basketball shoe that's perfect for everyday wear.

shoes.name: Air Jordan 1 Retro High
shoes.details: The Air Jordan 1 Retro High is a legendary sneaker in the Jordan lineup.

shoes.name: Court Vision Low
shoes.details: The Court Vision Low brings a classic basketball-inspired design to the streets.

shoes.name: Revolution 5
shoes.details: The Revolution 5 offers lightweight cushioning for your daily runs.

shoes.name: Benassi JDI
shoes.details: The Benassi JDI is a comfortable slide for post-game or casual wear.
